Tamer Hosny Sherif Abbas Farghaly (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1977), nke a maara site na aha nka ya bụ Tamer Hosni (Arabic), bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede egwu, onye nduzi na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ bịara n'ihu ọha mgbe ọ pụtara na teepu ngwakọta ya na ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwu n'Egypt

Hosny malitere ọrụ ya n'onwe ya na abọm ya nke afọ 2004 bụ Hob, na-aghọ onye na-agụ egwú ịhụnanya na-aga nke ọma ma ndị na-akwado ya nyere ya aha "King of the Generation". N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2019, Hosny mebiri Guinness World Record maka ọtụtụ onyinye nye bọọdụ mgbasa ozi.
A mụrụ Tamer Hosny na Cairo n'aka nna onye Egypt na nne onye Siria

N'adịghị ka nna ya, Hosny Sherif Abbas, Tamer Hosny tolitere na mmasị na bọọlụ ma gbaa egwuregwu ahụ afọ ise. Tamer Hosny nwere ahụmịhe nduzi mbụ ya n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ na-eduzi vidiyo egwu ya Se7eet 3la Sotha (Woke up to her voice)

Hosny nwere ọchịchọ ogologo oge ịghọ onye nduzi na ime vidiyo egwu nke ya. O gosipụtara na ihe nkiri Egypt nke afọ 2003 Halet Hob (A State of Love). N'afọ 2006, e jidere ya maka ịghọ aghụghọ akwụkwọ agha iji zere itinye ndị agha
A mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ otu afọ, mana ọ nọrọ naanị ọnwa isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ.
Hosny lụrụ onye na-asọmpi Star Academy na onye na-agụ egwu Moroccan bụ Bassma Boussel n'afọ 2012
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na otu nwa nwoke: Talyia, Amaya na Adam.
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ihe ọṅụṅụ Pepsi. Ọ bụkwa onye ama ama Arab mbụ na-akpọsa ụdị ugogbe anya ndị uwe ojii.
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, Hosny mere emume nzọụkwụ nwa oge na TCL Chinese Theatre na Hollywood, California, ebe ọ bụ onye Egypt / Arab mbụ na-ese ihe mere ya.
